trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a GDI+ bitmap, which consists of the pixel data for a graphics image and its attributes.
trans-unit.target: 封裝 GDI+ 點陣圖，這個點陣圖是由圖形影像的像素資料及其屬性所組成。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> is an object used to work with images defined by pixel data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 是用來處理像素資料所定義影像的物件。

trans-unit.source: A bitmap consists of the pixel data for a graphics image and its attributes.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖的像素資料的圖形映像和其屬性所組成。

trans-unit.source: There are many standard formats for saving a bitmap to a file.
trans-unit.target: 有許多標準格式將點陣圖儲存至檔案。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] supports the following file formats: BMP, GIF, EXIF, JPG, PNG and TIFF.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 支援下列檔案格式： BMP、 GIF、 EXIF、 JPG、 PNG 和 TIFF。

trans-unit.source: For more information about supported formats, see [Types of Bitmaps](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關支援之格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[類型的點陣圖](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can create images from files, streams, and other sources by using one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.%23ctor%2A> constructors and save them to a stream or to the file system with the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從檔案、 資料流和其他來源建立映像使用其中一種<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.%23ctor%2A>建構函式並將它們儲存至資料流或檔案系統與<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Images are drawn to the screen or to memory by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: 映像會使用來繪製到螢幕或記憶體<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件。

trans-unit.source: For a list of topics about working with image files, see [Working with Images, Bitmaps, Icons, and Metafiles](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/working-with-images-bitmaps-icons-and-metafiles.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用映像檔的相關主題的清單，請參閱[使用影像、 點陣圖、 圖示和中繼檔](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/working-with-images-bitmaps-icons-and-metafiles.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> class is not accessible across application domains.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>類別不能存取跨應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you create a dynamic <xref:System.AppDomain> and create several brushes, pens, and bitmaps in that domain, then pass these objects back to the main application domain, you can successfully use the pens and brushes.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您建立動態<xref:System.AppDomain>和該網域，然後傳遞這些物件會回到主要的應用程式定義域中建立幾筆刷、 畫筆與點陣圖，您可以成功地使用畫筆和筆刷。

trans-unit.source: However, if you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method to draw the marshaled <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, you receive the following exception.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法來封送處理繪製<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>，您會收到下列例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Remoting cannot find field "native image" on type "System.Drawing.Image".
trans-unit.target: 遠端處理類型 」 System.Drawing.Image"上找不到欄位 「 原生映像 」。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> from a file, using the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.GetPixel%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A> methods to recolor the image.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構新<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>從檔案、 使用<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.GetPixel%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A>方法，以將影像重新著色。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.PixelFormat%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Width%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Height%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 它也會使用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.PixelFormat%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Width%2A>，和<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Height%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Forms that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `Label1`, `PictureBox1`, and `Button1`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例為了搭配 Windows Form 包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名為`Label1`， `PictureBox1`，和`Button1`分別。

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼貼到表單，並將關聯`Button1_Click`方法按鈕之<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> from which to create the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />，用於建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> class from the specified existing image.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的現有影像初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The data stream used to load the image.
trans-unit.target: 用來載入影像的資料流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> class from the specified data stream.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的資料流，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You must keep the stream open for the lifetime of the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須維持資料流開啟的存留期<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>。

trans-unit.source: Due to a limitation of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] decoder, an <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=nameWithType> is thrown if you construct a bitmap from a .png image file with a single dimension greater than 65,535 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 因為限制的[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]解碼器，<xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=nameWithType>建構具有單一維度大於 65,535 個像素的.png 映像檔從點陣圖會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to load a bitmap from a stream.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從資料流載入點陣圖。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。

trans-unit.source: Create a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> named `PictureBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 建立表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>名為`PictureBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and call the `InitializeStreamBitmap` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`InitializeStreamBitmap`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stream" /> does not contain image data or is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stream" /> 未含有影像資料或為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="stream" /> contains a PNG image file with a single dimension greater than 65,535 pixels.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stream" /> 含有一個 PNG 影像檔案，其中有一個維度超過 65,535 個像素。

trans-unit.source: The bitmap file name and path.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖檔名稱和路徑。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> class from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的檔案，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The file name and path can be relative to the application or an absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 檔案名稱和路徑可以相對於應用程式或絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to open images with the following file formats: BMP, GIF, EXIF, JPG, PNG and TIFF.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式以來開啟映像下列的檔案格式： BMP、 GIF、 EXIF、 JPG、 PNG 和 TIFF。

trans-unit.source: For more information about supported formats, see [Types of Bitmaps](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關支援之格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[類型的點陣圖](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md)。

trans-unit.source: The file remains locked until the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 檔案仍會鎖定，直到<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified file is not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure that represent the size of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> class from the specified existing image, scaled to the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的現有影像 (已縮放至指定之大小)，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 作業失敗。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 的寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> with a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> enumeration value of <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb>.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>與<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>列舉值<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb>。

trans-unit.target: 作業失敗。

trans-unit.source: The data stream used to load the image.
trans-unit.target: 用來載入影像的資料流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> class from the specified data stream.

trans-unit.target: 從指定的檔案，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to open images with the following file formats: BMP, GIF, EXIF, JPG, PNG and TIFF.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式以來開啟映像下列的檔案格式： BMP、 GIF、 EXIF、 JPG、 PNG 和 TIFF。

trans-unit.source: For more information about supported formats, see [Types of Bitmaps](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關支援之格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[類型的點陣圖](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md)。

trans-unit.target: 檔案仍會鎖定，直到<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>處置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new bitmap from a file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構新的點陣圖檔案。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.GetPixel%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A> methods to recolor the image.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.GetPixel%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A>方法，以將影像重新著色。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.PixelFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它也會使用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.PixelFormat%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `Label1`, `PictureBox1` and `Button1`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例為了搭配 Windows Form 包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名為`Label1`，`PictureBox1`和`Button1`分別。

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼貼到表單，並將關聯`Button1_Click`方法按鈕之<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: for calling into unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於 unmanaged 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關的列舉： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: The class used to extract the resource.
trans-unit.target: 用來擷取資源的類別。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 資源名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> class from a specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的資源，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor combines the namespace of the given type with the string name of the resource and looks for a match in the assembly manifest.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式指定型別的命名空間結合字串資源的名稱，並尋找組件資訊清單中的相符項目。

trans-unit.source: For example you can pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> type and `Button.bmp` to this constructor and it will look for a resource named `System.Windows.Forms.Button.bmp`.
trans-unit.target: 例如您在傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>型別和`Button.bmp`至這個建構函式，它會尋找名為的資源`System.Windows.Forms.Button.bmp`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to construct a bitmap from a type, and how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構點陣圖，以從型別，以及如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼在 Windows Form 中的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `ConstructFromResourceSaveAsGif` method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`ConstructFromResourceSaveAsGif`方法，傳遞`e`為 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> from which to create the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />.

trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 的高度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.target: 從指定的現有影像 (已縮放至指定之大小)，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 的高度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object that specifies the resolution for the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 解析度的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 物件。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小，並使用指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 物件的解析度，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> that this method creates takes its horizontal and vertical resolution from the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DpiX%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DpiY%2A> properties of `g`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>這個方法會建立會從其水平和垂直解析度<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DpiX%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DpiY%2A>屬性`g`分別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="g" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="g" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 的寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 的高度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The pixel format for the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 的像素格式。

trans-unit.source: This must specify a value that begins with <c>Format</c>.
trans-unit.target: 這必須指定以「格式」<c></c> 開頭的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> class with the specified size and format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小和格式，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat" /> value is specified whose name does not start with *Format*.
trans-unit.target: 指定了 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat" /> 值，其名稱不是以「格式」開頭。

trans-unit.source: For example, specifying <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Gdi" /> will cause an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />, but <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb" /> will not.

trans-unit.source: Integer that specifies the byte offset between the beginning of one scan line and the next.
trans-unit.target: 整數，指定一條掃描線 (Scan Line) 的開頭和下一條之間的位元組位移 (Offset)。

trans-unit.source: This is usually (but not necessarily) the number of bytes in the pixel format (for example, 2 for 16 bits per pixel) multiplied by the width of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 這通常 (但不一定) 是像素格式的位元組數目 (例如，16 位元/像素為 2) 乘以點陣圖寬度。

trans-unit.source: The value passed to this parameter must be a multiple of four..
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至這個參數的值必須是四的倍數。

trans-unit.source: The pixel format for the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 的像素格式。

trans-unit.source: This must specify a value that begins with <c>Format</c>.
trans-unit.target: 這必須指定以「格式」<c></c> 開頭的值。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to an array of bytes that contains the pixel data.
trans-unit.target: 包含像素資料之位元組陣列的指標。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> class with the specified size, pixel format, and pixel data.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小、像素格式和像素資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The caller is responsible for allocating and freeing the block of memory specified by the `scan0` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端會負責配置和釋放記憶體所指定的區塊`scan0`參數。

trans-unit.source: However, the memory should not be released until the related <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> is released.
trans-unit.target: 不過，記憶體應該不會釋出直到相關<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>釋放。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定要鎖定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 部分。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode" /> enumeration that specifies the access level (read/write) for the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode" /> 列舉，指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 的存取層級 (讀取/寫入)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat" /> enumeration that specifies the data format of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat" /> 列舉，指定這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 的資料格式。

trans-unit.source: Locks a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> into system memory.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 鎖定在系統記憶體內。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData" /> that contains information about this lock operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData" />，包含這個鎖定作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> method to lock an existing bitmap in system memory so that it can be changed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>方法，以將現有點陣圖鎖定在系統記憶體中，以便以程式設計方式變更。

trans-unit.source: You can change the color of an image with the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A> method, although the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> method offers better performance for large-scale changes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更的色彩與影像<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A>方法中，雖然<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>方法個別提供較佳的效能，大規模的變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData> specifies the attributes of the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, such as size, pixel format, the starting address of the pixel data in memory, and length of each scan line (stride).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData>指定屬性的<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>，例如大小、 像素格式、 在記憶體中，像素資料的起始位址和長度為每個掃描線 （分散）。

trans-unit.source: When calling this method, you should use a member of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration that contains a specific bits-per-pixel (BPP) value.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法時，您應該使用的成員<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=nameWithType>列舉，其中包含特定位元-每個像素 (BPP) 值。

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=nameWithType> values such as <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Indexed> and <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Gdi> will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat?displayProperty=nameWithType>值例如<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Indexed>和<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Gdi>將會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Also, passing the incorrect pixel format for a bitmap will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，傳遞點陣圖的不正確的像素格式將會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.PixelFormat%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Width%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData.Scan0%2A> properties; the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.UnlockBits%2A> methods; and the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.PixelFormat%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Height%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Width%2A>，和<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData.Scan0%2A>屬性;<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.UnlockBits%2A>方法; 而<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。

trans-unit.source: This example is not designed to work correctly with all pixel formats, but to provide an example of how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此範例不是所有的像素格式中正常運作，但提供使用方式的範例<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a form and handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event by calling the `LockUnlockBitsExample` method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將它貼到表單，並處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>藉由呼叫事件`LockUnlockBitsExample`方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Makes the default transparent color transparent for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />.
trans-unit.target: 可讓這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />的預設透明色彩為透明。

trans-unit.source: The system palette defines one color as the default transparent, or alpha, color.
trans-unit.target: 系統調色盤會定義為預設透明，或 alpha 色彩的一種色彩。

trans-unit.source: This method makes the default transparent color transparent for this <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法讓預設的透明色彩透明這個<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>。

trans-unit.source: If no transparent color is specified by the system, <xref:System.Drawing.Color.LightGray%2A> is the transparent color.
trans-unit.target: 如果不透明的色彩由系統所指定<xref:System.Drawing.Color.LightGray%2A>是透明的色彩。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.MakeTransparent%2A>, the bitmap will be converted to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb> format, as this format supports an alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.MakeTransparent%2A>，點陣圖都會轉換成<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb>格式，此格式支援 alpha 色板。

trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Gets the color of a pixel in a <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: 取得中的像素色彩<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>。

trans-unit.source: Makes that color transparent for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 將點陣圖透明該色彩。

trans-unit.source: Draws the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 繪製<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>至螢幕。

trans-unit.target: 要設定之像素的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that represents the color to assign to the specified pixel.
trans-unit.target: 代表要指派給指定像素的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color of the specified pixel in this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 中指定之像素的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A> method to set the color of an individual pixel in an image programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.SetPixel%2A>方法來以程式設計方式設定映像中的個別像素的色彩。

trans-unit.source: You can also change an image programmatically by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以變更映像以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically for large-scale changes, the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A> method offers better performance.
trans-unit.target: 通常是針對大規模的變更，<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits%2A>方法個別提供較佳的效能。
